body_html:
@chenghuige I notice that you have cuda 7.5 and cudnn 4.0.7. Note that we recommend cuda 7.5 and cudnn 5:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html#optional-install-cuda-gpus-on-linux

I'm not sure this is related to your problem, but it's definitely something to try, if possible.
